briefTitle: Effect of Laughter Therapy on Perceived Stress and Quality of Life
officialTitle: Effect of Laughter Therapy on Perceived Stress and Quality of Life in Women With Breast Cancer: An Assessor-blinded, Parallel Group, Randomized Controlled Trial
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 years and older women,
* Stages II or III breast cancer
* Receiving Pacitaxel chemotherapy regimen per a week

Exclusion Criteria:

* Using any complementary and alternative (CAM) treatment method during practice
* Having psychological diseases
